text: Zootopia 2 (also known as Zootropolis 2 in Europe and the United Kingdom) is an upcoming American animated buddy cop comedy movie. It is expected to be released on November 26, 2025. It was directed by both Jared Bush and Byron Howard and was produced by Yvett Merino. It is the second movie in the Zootopia series and the sequel to the 2016 movie Zootopia. The movie follows Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde as they attempt to hunt down a snake named Gary who is causing chaos. Production for the movie started on April 15, 2024 with Goodwin revealing that she had recorded her first lines for the movie. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s 3D movies Category:2020s action comedy movies Category:2020s computer-animated movies Category:2020s buddy movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:3D animated movies Category:American 3D movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:American buddy movies Category:Computer-animated movies Category:Movies about rabbits and hares Category:Movies about snakes Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: Zootopia 2
